Upgrade.Title: Cloaked Fighters
Upgrade.Ability: Add the [CLOAK] Action to your Action Bar. While your squadron is Cloaked, you cannot perform a maneuver with a speed greater than 1. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Scorpion class attack squadron and no ship may be equipped with more than one "Cloaked Fighters" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Hidden Formation
Upgrade.Ability: Add the [SENSOR ECHO] Action to your Action Bar. When performing the [SENSOR ECHO] Action, you may only use a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template. If your squadron is Cloaked, after performing a [SENSOR ECHO] Action, you may discard this card to immediately perform an additional [SENSOR ECHO] Action as a free Action. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Focused Strike
Upgrade.Ability: If you damage an opposing ship's Hull with a critical damage, you may discard this card to draw 3 Damage Cards (instead of 1) and choose which one to place beside the enemy ship's Ship Card; discard the unused Damage Cards. No ship may be equipped with more than one "Focused Strike" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Torpedo Strike
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and place 3 Time Tokens on this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs. No ship may be equipped with more than one "Torpedo Attack" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Cover Fire
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may discard this card to add a number of defense dice to your roll equal to your current Primary Weapon value. No ship may be equipped with more than one "Cover Fire" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Reconnaissance
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Place a [SCAN] Token and an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Thrusters
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, if your ship is not Cloaked and you reveal a green maneuver on your maneuver dial you may discard this card to add 1 to your maneuver speed.

Upgrade.Title: Support Ship
Upgrade.Ability: When your last Attack Squadron Token is destroyed, discard this card instead of removing that Token. No ship may be equipped with more than one "Support Ship" Upgrade.
